summary: This is a patch to make the Static mode of Dynavision make a minimum range, so it would not look blurry at close.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a simple patch edit to Gopher's mod Dynavision, I made this for people who doesn't meet the requirements for a good ENB settings, and use Dynavision instead.

It replaces the Static mode of Dynavsion, it is to make the DOF have a minimum range before it kicks in rather than blurry close up, just replace this .esp with Dynavsion mod found here-  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/?

you will need to install Dynavision first, this is just a patch.



-P.S. - for those who are concern, this is just to help other people, i tried to P.M Gopher but cannot send a message since I think his Inbox is full.

Credits:
Bethesda for a wonderful game.
Nexus for hosting this Great site
Gopher for making Dynavision

I recommend Skysouls - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77104/?     game continues even opening menus. it's a game changer.
author: looooots

files.name: DOF pushed far back - higher blur
